p: In the presence of Pt-bis-Nt, the intensities of bands corresponding to the free oligonucleotide S8* and complex of OBP with the oligonucleotide S3* are diminished, whereas intensity of the band corresponding to the free oligomer (S3* + S7* + S8*) and its complex with Pt-bis-Nt is increased (data are not shown).
